name: Underneath the Ancient Ruin
description:
"Alicia, an experienced adventurer who is into exploring mysteries of the world, has finally found out the Ancient Ruin of Old World after a long time. Now she has to find a way to get inside and retrieve the Ancient Scroll to hide it from the demons, or else the world will come to an end."

IMPORTANT NOTE: At the third room, after you find the password of R + G + B, minus it by 785 to get the real password.

Instructions how to control:

Direction Keys: Moving and navigating.

Space or Z or Left Mouse: Confirming actions.

ESC or X or Right Mouse: Canceling actions.

During the game, you will be given some items called TOOLS to interact with the environment. Please look at the picture below:

Your current selected tool will be displayed at the top right corner of your screen. To circle between your tools, press Q or W (or if you are using a mobile device, touch the two arc-arrow icons). To use the selected tool, face or step on the suspected objects, then press Alt (or touch the star icon if you are using a mobile device).

The next thing is about Synthesis. This is a system that allows you to craft certain items or tools when you gather enough ingredients. To learn how to craft, please look at the pictures below:

First, you have to open your menu, then choose Synthesis.

The crafting window will be opened. Select Craft Item and choose the item you want to craft. Your new item will be ready afterward!

The last thing is about Disassembling Items. This is the opposite system of Synthesis. Instead of crafting an item from ingredients, you are allowed to break certain items into other ingredients. To learn how to disassemble, please take a look at the pictures below:

First: Open your menu and select Item.

Second: Choose the category and the item that you want to disassemble.

Third: Select Disassemble.

Then you will be asked for the Disassembling Solution. This solution is a must-have in order to break an item. Select it and move to the next step.

Fourth: Your ingredients from that item will be displayed here. Press Space or Z (or just touch the screen if you are using a mobile device) to confirm.

This is the old small Puzzle-type game I made when I first used RPG Maker VX Ace.

Now I'm porting it to MV to try and understand how this new engine works and to prepare for my next real RPG project on MV.
For my current RPG Game on RPG Maker MV, please follow my Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/RyanEntertainmentStudio/
